title: Mithril warhammer

properties.name: description
properties.value: The mithril warhammer is a warhammer stronger than the black warhammer, being made out of mithril. It may be used as an effective way of killing monsters weak to crush, such as earth warriors. Unlike other mithril weapons, it requires level 20 in Strength to wield.

Item ID1343

The mithril warhammer is a warhammer stronger than the black warhammer, being made out of mithril. It may be used as an effective way of killing monsters weak to crush, such as earth warriors. Unlike other mithril weapons, it requires level 20 in Strength to wield.

Players can make a mithril warhammer with the Smithing skill at level 59 using 3 mithril bars, giving the player 150 Smithing experience. Members can purchase this warhammer from Skulgrimen's Battle Gear in Rellekka, and Vigr's Warhammers in Keldagrim.

The mithril warhammer can be used as a substitute for a regular hammer when banging the big door at the entrance of Bandos' Stronghold in the God Wars Dungeon.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The weapon's position on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

21 April 2021
(update)
  • Mithril warhammers now require level 20 Strength to wield instead of level 20 Attack.
  • The mithril warhammer's strength bonus was increased from 20 to 27.
29 March 2004
(update)

The item became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

1 December 2003
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

[[File:Mithril warhammer detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''mithril warhammer''' is a [[warhammer]] stronger than the [[black warhammer]], being made out of mithril. It may be used as an effective way of killing [[monsters]] weak to [[crush]], such as [[earth warrior]]s. Unlike other [[mithril weapons]], it requires level 20 in [[Strength]] to wield.

Players can make a mithril warhammer with the [[Smithing]] [[skill]] at level 59 using 3 [[mithril bar]]s, giving the player 150 Smithing [[experience]]. [[Members]] can purchase this warhammer from [[Skulgrimen's Battle Gear]] in [[Rellekka]], and [[Vigr's Warhammers]] in [[Keldagrim]].

The mithril warhammer can be used as a substitute for a regular [[hammer]] when banging the big door at the entrance of [[Bandos' Stronghold]] in the [[God Wars Dungeon]].
